txt.en: 'I am ready to continue our ride south to Snowbourn, if you are. I ordered Reeve Fastred to empty his lands, sending his people across the Entwash where they can be better-defended, but he is young and I fear foolish. I ride to see if he has obeyed my command.\n\n'We will speak again in Snowbourn!'
'A brisk ride! Welcome to Snowbourn, my friend. Now to the business at hand.'
'If Reeve Fastred has not obeyed my command to send his people to safety across the Entwash, he will soon have the chance to explain it in person. I will meet you in Snowbourn!'
The next leg of your journey with Éomer will take you to the town of Snowbourn, in the Sutcrofts.
Éomer will meet you in Snowbourn outside the Mead Hall.\n\nYou should ride south and speak again with Éomer in Snowbourn, in the Sutcrofts.
